properties.name: Avenue Ale House
properties.description: Posted by Judi03825 S Oak park Ave, Oak Park, ILCasual fine dining with a twist. There is seating around the bar on the main floor and in the summer enjoy seating outside on the 2nd floor rooftop. A live band and karaoke on weekend nights turns this family friendly restaurant into a great hangout place for friends at night.

properties.name: Bar Louie
properties.description: Posted by Judi031122 Lake St, Oak Park, ILHot spot for a quick night on the town. This bar/restaurant offers a friendly and fun environment for all looking to have a good time! With several flat screen t.v.\'s surrounding the bar and different sports shows on each set, everyone can be happy. There is also seating at tables around the center bar for those who want to dine in and take advantage of the diverse menu which includes everything from blackened chicken and mini burgers with onion rings to salads and wraps.Don\'t forget about a nice drink while you\'re at it, 21 and older please. Good fun with good friends, and you don\'t need to be 21 to get in!

properties.name: Cosi
properties.description: Posted by Judi031101 Lake St, Oak Park, ILGreat little restaurant/cafe started in Italy. The atmosphere is so cozy and makes you feel like your in Italy. Great fresh and fast food! The make your own smores with your own personal fire place is a great end to you meal too!

properties.name: Frank Lloyd Wright Home and Studio
properties.description: Posted by Judi03951 Chicago Ave, Oak Park, IL 60302

properties.name: Fuego Loco
properties.description: Posted by Judi03Oak park, ILAuthentic, great Mexican food! From the moment you sit down you feel like you\'ve been transported to Mexico with the Mariachi\'s and the hundreds of hot sauces that line the walls. The chips and salsa will have you begging for more!

properties.name: Great Harvest Bread Co.
properties.description: Posted by Judi03736 Lake Street, Oak Park, ILThe best and freshest bread you\'ll find for miles!!! Great little spot to grab a quick lunch, bowl of soup and sandwich, and GREAT, fresh, hot bread...and there\'s always samples!!!

properties.name: Jerusalum Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Judi03 1030 Lake street, Oak Park, ILGreat little Cafe if you want a little something different. Middle Eastern cuisine that\'s fast and fresh and very satisfying. The falafel are to die for!

properties.name: Judi
properties.description: Posted by Judi03Oak Park, IL

properties.name: Oak Park and River Forest Highschool
properties.description: Posted by Judi03 60302

properties.name: The Brown Cow Ice Cream Parlor
properties.description: Posted by Judi037314 Madison Street, Oak Park, ILCute little ice cream parlor, family owned and very kid friendly. From birthday parties and baby showers to daily homemade waffle cones, ice cream cupcakes, and chocolate dipped bananas this small parlor is packed with homemade charm! Portions are very filling and prices are very affordable so go ahead and order that second scoop!
